website_summaries.verdict: A fun and engaging holiday LEGO calendar that's ideal for younger children.
pros: This calendar will appeal to younger kids with its brightly colored, easy to build pieces
Each piece has an undeniable festive theme
As an alternative to the traditional display, you can adorn your tree with these LEGO ornaments
cons: There are no mini figures in this set

customer_reviews.title: Friends set doesn't come with a minifig
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Friends calendar specifically. I wish the reviews weren't aggregated for all three sets. I get this advent calendar for my daughter every year. This is the first year I can recall (and I may be wrong) where it doesn't come with a minifig/Friend. Sure she has tons of minifigs that she can use with these things, but opening the minifig on day 1 and then using it with the rest of the set is one of her favorite parts. I suspect she's going to be a little disappointed. I am disappointed with LEGO's decision to not include a figurine in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Penny

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Friends 41353
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed with this set. It’s my fault for not looking more closely at what was included, but unlike previous years this set does not include any of the friends and you don’t put together things to make a bigger scene. Each one is a Christmas tree decoration. It has nothing at all to do with LEGO Friends, except the picture on the box. I had looked carefully at many sets, but this one went on sale and I thought I had already looked at it. My mistake. But I definitely don’t recommend it, if you are looking for something related to LEGO Friends. Side note, I really wish amazon wouldn’t lump all the reviews together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excited about this year's builds
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Friends Lego Advent calendar. I really like this year's kit because it incorporates more pieces and therefore more builds (500 pieces almost twice the previous years) and allows girls to use their builds as ornaments. Sure getting mini figs and setting a scene is fun but in years past it was not very cost effective for the amount of pieces included. It was cheaper to buy my grand daughter a regular Friends set the last several years. Thank you Lego for trying something different.
customer_reviews.author: Cowdoctor

customer_reviews.title: No LEGO Friends!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing there are no LEGO friends or pets. My daughter is going to be bummed. She really looks forward to the people and animals. The other advent calendars (Star Wars and City) have people. Take a close look.
customer_reviews.author: RI beach comber

customer_reviews.title: Not a hit..its a miss..
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased lego advent calendars every year for past 10+ years this was the first year my daughter was very disappointed.. each day you open just a small ornament to build and so far we are only on day 2 and couldnt complete day 2 since we are missing 3 pieces . Theres nothing special about this advent calendar in our opinion it's the worst one we have done... and we are a big lego family fan
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: New style, great Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This year The LEGO Group decided to change the style of the Advent Calendar, this year all 24 gifts are Ornaments for your Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.author: Oscar W Romero G

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loved this!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Including a picture of Day 1. Pieces are bigger that we thought. My daughter just loves it, wakes up every morning excited to open a new box and build her lego ornament. My daughter is super excited with this adevnt calendar. She has not opened yet as I bought for this upcoming Christmas. But she is very excited and the lego pieces look adorable. We don't mind that it doesn't bring any characters, we love the fact that you build the decorations and can then put then on your Christmas Tree.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: From gift to tradition
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased Lego advent calendars for our youngest children going on 4 years now. What started as a fun calendar countdown is now tradition! Each one has been unique, not too challenging, and perfectly themed for the winter holiday season. Our children are excited for each little build and the final scene upon completion. Of course these pieces become part of the Lego collection and get used for other creative builds, further making these a long-term value for families like us.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hemenway

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Fun advent calendar that we can keep and reuse. Way better than those tasteless chocolate ones. Can't wait to give it to my kid on December 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Romans

customer_reviews.title: Not fun / difficult
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year old daughter and her friend build huge LEGO sets following the provided instruction books. They did not like this Advent Calrndar set because they couldn’t figure out what to build due to no instructions or pictures are provided. It would have been nice to at least have one page with pictured images of all the little LEGO things fully constructed. They could have then at least matched the colored pieces to a picture providing a clue for what to build.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Daily fun for 8 and 11 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are really enjoying this! I have an 8 year old girl and an 11 year old boy. The LEGO items are Christmas things like; stocking, snowman, a fireplace or a heart to name a few. I am pleased with the package and presentation. We didn’t know the picture to assemble was on the inside flap of the day. My kids have no problem following the pictorial directions to build. This is our first LEGO advent calendar. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kennita Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Thee advent calendar to get
customer_reviews.text: So much better than any other Lego advent calendar I've put together. I have a 5yr old boy and we are having an absolute blast putting these ornaments together. A must get, especially if you want to build with your child. Great family time activity!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent calendar option for elementary-age kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the Lego Friends Afvemt Calendar (2018 version); she’s almost 5 years old and a few of the daily sets have been a wee bit advanced for her, but they've made for a fun activity each morning after breakfast and we work on the more complicated ones together. Most of the finished pieces have a small ring on them that will allow a thin ribbon or some yarn to be threaded through to hang them up on a tree or a garland, which is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rozmus

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for Christmas for our 4 year old. The legos are a little tight and sometimes hard to snap it but still she's enjoying putting them together each day. It comes in a box with windows to open and each day is a new surprise. Take out the package, build it and then hang the ornaments on a tree. Not sure if it's a default of my box but there's not string to hang the ornaments. Each ornament also comes with a strange number of extra pieces. We're collecting all the extras to make something fun and unique at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Becky H.

customer_reviews.title: Countdown of ornaments
customer_reviews.text: The product was a day by day calendar countdown. Each item was LEGO but was an ornament. It really had nothing to do with the LEGO “friends” other than the items were more colorful than the regular. The “instructions” were just photos printed on the other side of the punch out. My 6.5 YO had a hard time with a lot of them. I would have to figure them out myself. Some ornaments we couldn’t tell what they were even after assembled. All in all, the product was complete but it was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Gem

customer_reviews.title: Love the ornaments!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Friends versions and looked closely at the item before ordering it so I knew I was getting a different ornament to make each day and that's exactly why I ordered it. I was a little nervous on the first day, because there is just a picture, no instructions, but by the second day, my 6yo figured out easily how to use the picture to build. Big hit with my kids. And big hit with me, as the Legos are on the tree not cluttering up the floor or table.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Tiny builds but no mini figures at all! Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cute but there are no mini figures at all. LEGO misses the mark for girls, again. This kit contains tiny ornaments most have a way to hang them for display but several do not. The gingerbread man was missing in ours but LEGO was quick to apologize and to send a replacement (haven’t received it yet) There were a lot of lose parts that were not bagged at all. They fell out when we opened day 1. The 24th was not bagged at all. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and brought it to work to sit on my desk during the Christmas season. It was the highlight of my morning to open a new window and assemble the ornament. Some of the builds were obvious and others required a little bit of thinking and creativity. I had considered other LEGO nativity sets, but am so glad I selected this one, as the mini builds are also ornaments. Super excited for next year's advent calendar now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get baggies and cut off pictures if you want to rebuild later.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved these! Only downside is that you open a slot one at a tie to build (like an advent calendar or something) the picture on the inside of the slot is how you build it. Once you throw the box away you don’t have picture to rebuild. I tore the picture off of all of the slots and put them in ziplocks in order to rebuild if she wanted too. But she loved all the different fun Christmas themed building that was going on
customer_reviews.author: Doniell

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite calendar thus far.  Ornaments were well designed!
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the complaints, just no pleasing some people. This years set for Friends focused on ornaments, which my daughter used to decorate her mini tree. This is something we’ll enjoy doing year after year versus the generic scenes. Thus, a major advantage to this set as it will last a long time. Put tree on a timer and it makes a great night light for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: New mama

customer_reviews.title: So happy! A small ornament build everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I've never gotten one of these before so I wasn't disappointed in the lack of a minifig because I wasn't expecting it. I knew they were all intended to be ornaments also. There are no detailed instructions, just a simple image completed on the inside of the cardstock door so don't tear it! lol. Its a great deal I think. I will be getting these every year from now on
customer_reviews.author: Alayne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a girl or boy
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome! I’m not sure why they made it appear like it’s for girls only. This is a great set for boys and girls alike. In fact I think it’s a better value and more fun to assemble than their “for boys” advent calendars. We will likely purchase one of these sets each year if they keep updating them. The best part is that each of the mini-sets has a place to hang them on a Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: TL Shopper

customer_reviews.title: What kid doesn't like Lego's?
customer_reviews.text: Best present ever! The kids couldn't put it down, fought over who got to open the next window, took it apart, put it back together and finally displayed their item as a decoration. It is so great to give something that the kids really want. Sometimes they look at what you bought and they go "Oh thanks" and put it aside. This was not put aside. Plan to buy new edition next year too.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a package with only girls on the outside. The calendar is pink and purple. I thought it would be gender neutral but after my son saw it he was really upset because he thought it was a “girl” gift. He’s over it and building the days. It’s very cute and even though he’s grown out of Legos he is still enjoying this. They should package it differently though.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Day

customer_reviews.title: Best year yet!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yo Lego fanatic loves this set. She looks forward to an advent calendar each year and this is a great alternative to candy! This year's is the best yet. Each cute little Lego object is an ornament she can hang on the tree! She has a tiny one in her room and it's all decked out in Lego. Homerun this year, Lego. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: OhioMomofFive

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to what it really is
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen the LEGO Advent sets before and thought this would be great for my grandson to save for next year. How disappointing! It certainly isn’t a calendar as stated. It’s all little bags in a egg carton like box. So sorry... love Legos but this is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: EllieM

customer_reviews.title: Please go back to the old style!
customer_reviews.text: Every year we buy the Lego friends advent calendar. Do NOT like the changes for this year. It doesn’t come with any “friends”. Also the box is backwards of previous years. It used to open into a scene and then everyday you got a new piece to add. This set just feels like LEGO was being cheap and lazy this year. My daughter was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughters enjoyed this calendar. It was a bit difficult for the 4 year old but the 8 year old did not have too many issues. We had to YouTube a couple of days to figure out how to put the ornament together. Hopefully next year's will be similar in regards to being ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: KMarie75

customer_reviews.title: Lego Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put in my wooden advent calendar for the grandkids. Love that eaxh one is individually packaged, and the way it came in the box. You dont need a seperate advent calendar. it has perforated openings and numbered for each day. It does come with pic of what each one is.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sweet

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this advent calendar. She had a lego gift every day to open and piece together. She had a Christmas tree in her bedroom and put the constructed pieces under her tree. It was very cute and less expensive than the advent calendar in the LEGO store
customer_reviews.author: Dana A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego advent calendar we have ever had
customer_reviews.text: We have had many lego advent calendars over the years but this is the best by far, each one is an ornament that can be hung on a tree which was just so great, the kids have asked if we can pull them all apart and do it all over again next Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Philip McDermid

customer_reviews.title: My girls LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: My girls absolutely loved this advent calendar set and fought each day over who was going to open and put together the Lego set. A small Lego set in EVERY box (unlike some other sets). Very cute and fun! Will definitely get again!
customer_reviews.author: sem

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year for my niece. This was I can give a gift that she can open everyday for 25 days. I don't know what I'll do once she's grown. Maybe she'll just love legos forever! LOL Sweet gift for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Shoppe Girl

customer_reviews.title: My three year old niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece and my sister showed me videos of her opening it everyday. I didn’t realize that all of the pieces had parts that allow them to be strung up as Christmas ornaments. Kept her busy till Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pinney

customer_reviews.title: great fun for my young children
customer_reviews.text: cute and great fun for my young children. They used the little items they made with other lego sets and playmobile characters.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My 6.5 year old daughter has LOVED this so far. The only thing she has seemed sad about was that there has been no figurines. Her brother got the main LEGO advent and it has already had 3 ( we started early counting down to a trip)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Young

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Christmas-themed builds
customer_reviews.text: My children love this new take on the Lego Friends Advent calendar. Even my older ones find the builds fun, and I like that they are all Christmas-themed ornaments that we can then hang on our tree. Very creative.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter will love it...
customer_reviews.text: They will make nice size ornaments for the Christmas tree. Opening one every day until Christmas....
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rabeaux

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got my daughter this one and my son the lego city. This was disappointing because it wasn't as interactive. I wish it had been more playable than ornaments. It really only can be used in December.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved building a little Lego ornament to hang on the tree each day. There are no formal instructions, just a picture for each one. My 9yo had no issue building them on her own in just a few minutes each.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Holiday Tradition
customer_reviews.text: A Must Add Holiday tradition! My child Loved opening and building a Lego everyday. We had them all together on a small tree. The daily legos were fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Amlung

customer_reviews.title: What is this thing?
customer_reviews.text: This is our first year doing a Lego Friends calendar. I was a little disappointed that there weren't any Minifigures, but I should have paid closer attention when ordering. My big question is what is this thing? We can't figure it out. Our best guess is that it's Communion goblet, maybe(?).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my ten, almost 11 year old. Not too babyish. The ornaments are very cool and fun to make, and I have a feeling she’ll keep them forever. She said it’s like opening a Christmas present every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm Jodi

customer_reviews.title: This year not as good
customer_reviews.text: LEGO must be running out of ideas - my daughter was a little disappointed this year. We will probably continue to buy them every year, but I hope next years is a little more exciting
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Worn box
customer_reviews.text: This is the first LEGO Friends advent calendar I’ve purchased and the pieces are still neatly packaged inside the box. As this was to be a gift for my grandson, the box is an issue for me. It is worn, taped ends have torn the box. It is definitely not in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne palin

customer_reviews.title: Love LEGO & this advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great tradition to add to the holidays! The kids LOVED opening each day & building the ornament. Really fun - and wasn’t too girly - our son and daughters all enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebiel and Erica Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Contains NO minifigs
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing that this contains no mini-figures. We get various LEGO advent calendars every year and have never gotten one that doesn't have some minifigs. This one does not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luck

customer_reviews.title: Cutest advent calendar I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved this product! Highly preferable to simple paper advent calendars, or those containing cheap chocolate. If you know someone who likes small toys, or Legos in particular, this is the advent calendar for them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Changed the box style
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was in tears when she realized that this year’s advent calendar doesn’t have a platform to arrange the Legos. They changed the style of the box, so it opens the opposite way, and you cannot lay out the Legos on a cardboard scene. We also bought two of the versions for boys, and those are in the same style as last year, with a fun place to arrange the Legos. My daughter was so upset that her brothers got calendars that were in the traditional style, and she did not. This was a bad change by Lego.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: It's Lego, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: My first Lego advent calendar. Won't be my last. This particular one, you can use each daily piece as an ornament (they all had a little hole for a hook).
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: My kiddos love this!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos LOVE this! I have four kids and they will each get to build 6 things (it came out even which is important lol).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cool way to distract a kid until Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar made the wait tolerable for my 5 year old daughter :) A nice set of LEGO and she was able to put them together all by herself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eberhard

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed to see that this years calendar didn’t include figures or animals but we ended up really enjoying this set. We put bakers twine on the ornaments and hung them on a mini tree.
customer_reviews.author: OTgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This set was awesome. The whole family enjoyed it and had a great time finding out what each day had waiting for us. All of the legos were very cool pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter love this. She looked forward to every day with a new project for her and her dad could put it together and place the new ornament on her small tree.
customer_reviews.author: GRC

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter LOVED This!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter who loves Legos and loves doing the advent calendars. She looked so forward to this every night. It was a treat for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best ever LEGO friends advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best LEGO Friends advent calendars. Each of the daily LEGO surprises was an ornament. We purchased a small tree to hang them on. Is now a holiday decoration for years to come! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Maitsiko

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES this Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd year I have given my granddaughter a LEGO Calendar. It is so much better than candy everyday! She enjoys creating the new itty bitty item each day.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Story

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved putting the ornaments together each morning leading up to Christmas day. They were so cute! Only negative that I could mention is that two of the days had the same ornament but she wasn’t too worried. Even with that being said, we’ll most likely buy another for next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 25 Lego ormanent builds!!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is wonderful. Each day is a new ornament build. My daughter is even getting up early before school to build them and hang them on the tree. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Our elf brings the advent calendar every year. This year we decided to try the LEGO one. My daughter LOVED it. She had fun building each little project.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this 😍. A perfect Advent calendar adventure for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Shirl Peters

customer_reviews.title: Ornaments made from legos each day
customer_reviews.text: This set makes ornaments from legos. My daughter really enjoys seeing which new ornament she gets to make each day. So far the ornaments have all been really cute. (They do not include a hook to hang them though.)
customer_reviews.author: C Fults

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: She is loving checking it everyday to see what comes next. This is our first Lego Friends Advent, but I doubt it will be our last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best calendar yet!
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the cutest set yet. Had the most adorable ornaments to assemble everyday and will be so cute on the tree next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Emelko

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for xmas 2018. Just as described. Arrived in perfect condition. Child loved it.
customer_reviews.author: travelllllller

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lego Advent calendars
customer_reviews.text: We get a Lego Advent calendar each year. They're always fun. We enjoyed having these little ornament Lego sets this year. Nice variety.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been just perfect! Every day is a lego project that is an ornament. They are perfect for the small tree in her room!
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling set - my only complaint so far is that the wrong set of blocks was in day 5 so we appear to missing the snowman...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as exciting as the boy set
customer_reviews.text: My sons set was way more exciting and engaging. These were all ornaments or something. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Family Advent activity
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, my young kids (5&7) did okay with them. Some were a little challenging as the pictures aren't super descriptive. Good evening activity for family. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Such cute little lego items!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason why I gave it a 4 was because the box is misprinted and upside down when you open it, so you can't use the box to display the figures once they are created. Definitely a manufacturer's defect.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: Me and my 5 yr old girl enjoyed putting together a piece each morning. Was so glad to have found this before Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: JIMIZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter. I gave it to the family Dec 1 and they opened everyday til Christmas. They love it and it’s fun to see the ornaments on their tree. The ornaments are really small but super cute. I think my son in law likes it more than anyone but it’s his special thing he does with his daughter everyday . Home run!
customer_reviews.author: Greta Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build, but then what?
customer_reviews.text: It was fun for my daughter to have something new to build each day, but they were hard to play with. What are you going to do with a Lego Christmas stocking? And like with many of the newer LEGO sets, the pieces are so specific it’s hard to use them when building something else.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thiry

customer_reviews.title: Really well done by Lego
customer_reviews.text: My five year old daughter is having fun putting these together and decorating a small tree on the dresser in her room.
customer_reviews.author: David Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 y.o. daughter. She loves it. She can hardly wait every morning to see what the LEGO surprise for the day is!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mumm

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet opened this Lego set as it is not Dec 1st but based on the front of the box there will be a lot of excitement each day of December!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Digby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: This set made a new ornament every day. They were easy for my 8 year old to build and looked great on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: iluvoinkrs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Items are very cute & a great way to start the day for kids who love Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Allison J. Govreau

customer_reviews.title: All builders will love this not just for girls
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, everyday he runs to get the next build. He hasn't forgetten or skipped like the typical candy calendars. He looks forward to it each day. I was a bit confused by the packaging as it looks like it was intended for a girl but the built pieces are gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of many

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: One of my 8 yr old’s fave Xmas gifts. So much fun putting the pieces together, very creative but easy to assemble without instructions even for that age. And they have hole to hang as Xmas ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Ab0917

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order the Lego Friends version!
customer_reviews.text: I order the Lego advent calendars every year. Opened them up and the Lego Friends is printed upside down. Can’t even return it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Ok but won’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but the fact they all don’t go together to build a scene as other advent calendars similar was a bummer to my child.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkdot

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this advent calendar and we got to spend time together every day working on each one
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: No Lego girl figures
customer_reviews.text: Been getting these calendars for years for my girls, and they were disappointed there were no figures inside. That being said, each item they made could be hung as an ornament. Cool concept, just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: pinkladiesMD

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big hit at our house. My daughter loves to get up and put these together every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P

customer_reviews.title: Great little ornaments to add to the tree
customer_reviews.text: I love how all of the days/figures have loops to put string through to add to a tree. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: JanePG

customer_reviews.title: Lego Advent Calendar 2018
customer_reviews.text: My kids are going to be SO excited for a new advent calendar and who doesn’t love Legos? The package arrived on time...actually much earlier than it said it would be here. Thanks for a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Buescher

customer_reviews.title: Christmas fun!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Shipped to my granddaughters in Japan and they have jumped out of bed each day looking forward to their little surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Not like 2017 calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the 2017 Lego Friends advent calendar. She played with the minifigures and pets and enjoyed building the kits. She has been very disappointed with this year’s. There are no minifigs or animals, which was a major part of the pretend play for her. I hope Lego brings them back in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set so much! It was great fun for my 7 year old son. He was so excited to see what ornament he would build for the day. I had to order him his own tree because he was so proud of his work. His Lego tree is my new favorite Christmas decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Wood Family

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun advent calendar. My kids love putting together the set each day
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces (8 & 11) loved these. Great gift for LEGO-obsessed kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Lego Friends
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it but the only downside was there are no character pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Yearly tradition
customer_reviews.text: We love the annual tradition of legos advent! Our daughter looks forward to it every year and can’t wait for it to “arrive” at our doorstep on Dec 1st for her!
customer_reviews.author: GirlyWhirlyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Somebody can't get a single order correct.
customer_reviews.text: This got delivered to the wrong grandchild. Not sure how that happened since I ordered each one separately and delivered to the individual child just so something like this didn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: kelven

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my niece. She had a blast opening a new Lego every day!!
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Suntheimer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is the new tradition. My daughter ran straight to this every morning for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: TerryTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 62, but I still like Advent calendars and LEGO® block toys.
customer_reviews.author: peaceful contemplator

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends Advent Calendar 41353, New 2018 Edition, Small Building Toys, Christmas Countdown Calendar for Kids (500 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Open the LEGO Friends 41353 Advent calendar each day in December to build a new decoration for your house or Christmas tree. This calendar has 24 secret compartments, each containing a buildable surprise, including decorations to represent each of the 5 friends from Heart lake city.
feature_bullets: Build and collect 24 festive LEGO friends gifts in the run up to Christmas
500 pieces; Christmas Advent calendar with toys for boys and girls aged between 6 and 12 and for fans and kids of all ages
This LEGO friends Advent calendar 41353 model building set can be built together with all other original LEGO play sets and LEGO building bricks for creative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars524 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
